game.name: Glory To The Heroes™
game.genres: 액션, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Glory to the Heroes set in the Russian-Ukrainian war is an immersive singleplayer and PvPvE FPS with combined arms gameplay, involving many kinds of different military units and vehicles on the battlefield, where the action is happening in the real-world locations of actual battles.
